      - content: >-
          Retrieve a single node using POST with full unified filtering support.


          **Purpose**: Same as GET endpoint but supports complex filtering
          through JSON body.


          **Returns**: A single node object with fields controlled by the
          filters.


          ## Request Structure


          ```json

          {
            "filters": {
              "field_set": "content",
              "include_fields": ["relationships", "confidence_score"],
              "exclude_fields": ["embeddings"],
              "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"],
              "min_confidence": 0.8
            }
          }

          ```


          ## Examples


          ```bash

          # Basic request

          POST /node/abc123

          {
            "filters": {
              "field_set": "basic"
            }
          }


          # Complex filtering

          POST /node/abc123

          {
            "filters": {
              "field_set": "content",
              "include_fields": ["relationships"],
              "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"],
              "min_confidence": 0.7
            }
          }

          ```

{/* This file was generated by Fumadocs. Do not edit this file directly. Any changes should be made by running the generation command again. */}

Retrieve a single node using POST with full unified filtering support.

**Purpose**: Same as GET endpoint but supports complex filtering through JSON body.

**Returns**: A single node object with fields controlled by the filters.

## Request Structure

```json
{
  "filters": {
    "field_set": "content",
    "include_fields": ["relationships", "confidence_score"],
    "exclude_fields": ["embeddings"],
    "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"],
    "min_confidence": 0.8
  }
}
```

## Examples

```bash
# Basic request
POST /node/abc123
{
  "filters": {
    "field_set": "basic"
  }
}

# Complex filtering
POST /node/abc123
{
  "filters": {
    "field_set": "content",
    "include_fields": ["relationships"],
    "frame_types": ["claim", "evidence"],
    "min_confidence": 0.7
  }
}
```
